thread.title: Skype Users Can Protect Themselves Online
thread.title_full: Skype Users Can Protect Themselves Online

author: prbuzz.com
title: Skype Users Can Protect Themselves Online
text:
Imagine logging into the company website, only to find that it won’t load and there is no access to the internet or customers. Perhaps they fell victim to a scam that has drained their hard-earned money. Maybe they are gamer's, and are a victim of a DDOS attack. In all of these situations, there is something that can be done. Users can find the IP address of the attacker and use this for tracking purposes, all with just a Skype username.
Millions of people use Skype every day for communications with friends, family, and coworkers. What many people do not know is that Skype does not keep IP addresses private. This isn’t something a Skype user can find by himself or herself, however. This is where the Skype Resolver By Samantha becomes useful.
Using just a Skype username or an email address, the Skype Resolver By Samantha tracks an IP address is seconds, which can be used to find the location of a user that has been harassing or scamming other people. This information can be used to identify the guilty party in order to pursue legal action or recover money that was lost in an online scam.
Even users with private Skype accounts can be tracked. Users who don’t have the Skype username can also use the tool provided by Skype Resolver By Samantha to find Skype usernames registered to any email address. The username can then be run through the Skype Resolver to identify the IP address and location.
It is important to note that anyone using a proxy server or virtual private network (also known as VPN) with each login to Skype may bypass this system. Those who believe they may become victim to an attack through a Skype Resolver can use these methods to protect their own IP addresses.
Whether it is from a random person that has targeted someone for a money scam online or a competitor that has sneakily shut down its competition, the Skype Resolver By Samantha helps victims fight back against anonymous thieves and bullies with just a single username.
